Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 61st overall pick, by Malibu in 1964...
Injured on 8/6/1967 with a Inflamed Groin Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 5/12/1968 with a Broken Nose, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 4/19/1969, off Joseph Rizzi (NE)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/26/1970, off Long John Willoughby (PIT)...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Pittsburgh on 4/13/1975...
Signed as a free agent by Troy on 2/1/1978 to a 3-year deal worth $5,000,000 per year...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Shortstop in 1978...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Shortstop in 1979...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Coney Island on 8/17/1980...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/1/1980, hitting .462 with 1 HR, 8 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Bay City on 2/18/1981 to a 4-year deal worth $3,129,400 per year...
Traded from Bay City to Plum Grove on 2/2/1982 (Going to BC: RF D. Maser, C F. Curnutt. Going to PG: SS J. Patt)...
Injured on 6/3/1983 with a Sore Back, out for 1-2 weeks...
